bioconda.name: bioconductor-annotationtools
bioconda.summary: Annotate microarrays and perform cross-species gene expression analyses using flat file databases

biotools.summary: Functions to annotate microarrays, find orthologs, and integrate heterogeneous gene expression profiles using annotation and other molecular biology information available as flat file database (plain text files).

bioschemas.name: annotationTools
bioschemas.summary: Functions to annotate microarrays, find orthologs, and integrate heterogeneous gene expression profiles using annotation and other molecular biology information available as flat file database (plain text files).
